item.title: Bangalore to Kodaikanal Solo Trip Plan
item.description: A solo trip from Bangalore to Kodaikanal can be a wonderful experience, as you'll get to explore the misty hills, scenic landscapes, and serene lakes of this charming hill station. Here's a suggested itinerary for your journey Route Bangalore -> Salem -> Dindigul -> Kodaikanal -> Salem -> Bangalore Day 1: Bangalore to Kodaikanal Start your trip early in the m
item.dc:creator: Karthik Kumar D K
